Subject: Agent Installation
Description: I am using a test device to test and installing EPP agent manually. I did so along with the certificates, but it shows NO for certificate available & certificate trusted. The device also does not show up on the console. The Server IP and Port are listed properly. The Connected says NO and Policy Received is empty/shows nothing,
What_We_Know__c: The Certificate was validated and trusted after we assigned a Content Aware Protection policy to the test computer.
Solution_Comment__c: The Certificate was validated and trusted after we assigned a Content Aware Protection policy to the test computer.
